name: Google BigQuery
description: The BigQuery connector allows you to access the BigQuery REST API through WSO2 ESB. BigQuery is a tool that allows you to execute SQL-like queries on large amounts of data at outstanding speeds.

operations.name: init
operations.description: Common method having the configurations applicable to all the business methods in the Connector.

operations.name: getAccessTokenFromAuthorizationCode
operations.description: Get a new access token by negotiating the authorization code along with client_secret and client_id.

operations.name: getAccessTokenFromRefreshToken
operations.description: Get a new access token by negotiating the refresh token along with client_secret and client_id.

operations.name: getAccessTokenFromServiceAccount
operations.description: Get an access token from the service account..

operations.name: getDataset
operations.description: Gets the specified dataset by dataset ID.

operations.name: listDatasets
operations.description: List datasets of a project.

operations.name: runQuery
operations.description: Execute query.

operations.name: listProjects
operations.description: List projects.

operations.name: listTabledata
operations.description: List available tabledata.

operations.name: insertAllTableData
operations.description: Insert tabledata into a table.

operations.name: getTable
operations.description: Gets the specified table by table ID.

operations.name: listTables
operations.description: List tables.
